channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Mexico will stop flow of migrants after speaking with Mexican president following tariff threats
item.description: President-elect Trump on Wednesday said he had a productive conversation with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo over the phone.

item.title: The New York Times Gets the University of Florida Wrong
